data.title: THE MIDNIGHT GHOST TRAIN Releases New Video From Upcoming LP; To Play DESCENDANTS OF CROM ⋆ Riff Relevant
data.meta_description: THE MIDNIGHT GHOST TRAIN Releases New Video From Upcoming LP; To Play DESCENDANTS OF CROM ⋆ Riff Relevant
data.text:
Article By: Pat ‘Riot’ Whitaker ‡ Edited By: Leanne Ridgeway

Kansas-based organic rockers The Midnight Ghost Train have a lot going on right now and in the foreseeable future both.

First, the band is set to release their new studio album ‘Cypress Ave.‘ on July 28th, via Napalm Records. Early reports are claiming this to be the band’s most diverse outing yet, one sure to please fans of the band, both old and new.

Second, and connected to the first news above, The Midnight Ghost Train has debuted their new official video, “Red Eyed Junkie Queen“. The track is a heavy rocking, solid swinging number full of energetic swagger. Check it out below.

Cypress Ave. tracklist:

Tonight

Red Eyed Junkie Queen

Glenn’s Promise

Bury Me Deep

The Watchers Nest

Break My Love

Lemon Trees

The Boogie Down (feat. Sonny Cheeba)

Black Wave

The Echo

I Can’t Let You Go (Bonus Track)

Lastly, The Midnight Ghost Train is one of many amazing bands set to perform at this year’s inaugural Descendants Of Crom Festival.

Taking place at Cattivo nightclub in Pittsburgh, PA. on Saturday, September 30th, the one-day event has locked down a jaw-dropping roster of acts. Alongside The Midnight Ghost Train are bands like Earthride, Solace, Valkyrie, Foghound, Brimstone Coven, EYE, Wasted Theory, Archarus, Monolith Wielder, Karma To Burn, Horseburner, Cant, Ol’ Time Moonshine, Lady Beast, Stinking Lizaveta, and headliners Penance.

You can get more information, details, and ticket info for Descendants Of Crom here.
